claimGovernance().details: Claim Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the new Governor.

governor().details: Returns the address of the current Governor.

isGovernor().details: Returns true if the caller is the current Governor.

setUniswapAddr(address).details: Set address of Uniswap for performing liquidation of strategy reward tokens. Setting to 0x0 will pause swaps.

swap().details: Execute a swap of OGN for OUSD via Uniswap or Uniswap compatible protocol (e.g. Sushiswap)*

transferGovernance(address).details: Transfers Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the current Governor. Must be claimed for this to complete

params.amount: amount of the token to be transferred

transferToken(address,uint256).notice: Owner function to withdraw a specific amount of a token
